prefix.desc: Changes the prefix for your Server

clear.desc: Clears server info for current server and sets settings and prefix to default

kick.desc: Kicks a user with an optional reason

ban.desc: Bans a user with an optional reason

math.desc: Evaluates math using MathJS (Temporarily Disabled for Vulnerabilities)

invite.desc: Creates a link that can be used to invite this bot to another server

capital.desc: Renames current channel with capital letters. Type your Capitalized Channel Name after the command
